summary: Page 87 (left side), chapter 5. Sections 133-139. All 7 sections captured correctly with generally accurate text. A few minor reading errors and one editorial insertion.

issues.description: OCR has 'ונמצא לדעת ריתחא' but image appears to read 'ונמצא דבעידן ריתחא' (it is found that at a time of anger). The word 'לדעת' should be 'דבעידן'.
OCR has 'אבל חלוק נדרים בזה לבחן באיזה אופן' but image seems to read 'אבל חלוק נדרים בזה דכיון באיזה אופן'. The word 'לבחן' may be 'דכיון'.
OCR inserted editorial brackets '[ - ואז]' which are not in the original printed text. This is AI-generated editorial content that should not be in the data.
